mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id, c.author_email, a.id AS author_id, a.username AS author_username, pr.profile_image_url AS author_profile_image_url, c.content, c.created_at FROM post_comments c JOIN accounts a ON a.email = c.author_email LEFT JOIN profiles pr ON pr.email = c.author_email WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
